name: Car Repair for kids
description:
Can you repair you car in the garage? Yes you can! , first select the sports vehicle to repair and go to the work shop. Our app have tons of parts and body cars.
This is a crazy adventurous garage game for kids. They will learn how to take care of their vehicles and fix it.
You can take pictures of your custom design and keep it in your device.

Features:
✔ Full version with no ads.
✔ Mechanic Shop specifically design for kids.
✔ New cars like Monster Trucks and Hot Rods,etc...
✔ More than 50 body parts and 30 famous race cars.
✔ Lots of diferent spare parts.
✔ For 1 to 5-year-olds!
